thread.title: TONY GREINER
thread.title_full: Brushy Mountain Bee Farm reviewed by TONY GREINER

author: TONY GREINER
title: TONY GREINER
text:
Called to place my order, don't like over internet order with credit card..
A well informed lady was very helpful in placing me order,,,,
Received my order in less than a week, Every thing was correct, I feel that if i did have a problem, and i said IF, I'm sure it would have been taken care as quickly and efficiently as my order was taken..
Thank you
tony
